mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_no, user_no, notice_title, notice_content, notice_date) VALUES (#{noticeNo}, #{userNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, SYSDATE())
mapper.select: select notice_no AS noticeNo, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent from notice where notice_no = '${noticeNo}'
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title='${noticeTitle}', notice_content='${noticeContent}' WHERE notice_no='${noticeNo}'
